responsibilities.info: Involved in designing the user experience interface, UI requirements, and converting the findings into UI designs
Responsible for building the front-end for multiple applications using Angular 6/8 and Material Design principles

subInfo.info: Reporting Studio: Product to help a bank generate regulatory reports using out-of-the-box capabilities
BondScore China: Bilingual product to help financial institutions assess bond issuers and make better investment decisions
Scorecard Suite: Product built with a JSON template driven UI to help provide different models and scorecard results

responsibilities.info: Led the implementation of several products including

subInfo.info: Galileo: Suite of front-end components used by all Moody's Analytics products to ensure a consistent user experience
Regulatory Cloud: Migrated Moody's Analytics AnaCredit product from on-premise to AWS to provide high availability of resources and reduce cost for our customers

responsibilities.info: Gathered requirements by communication with all consumers to collect their needs, analytical vision to understand them and technical skills to determine the feasibility
Created, prioritized and planned user stories based on their business value and return on investment
Created high fidelity interactive mockups as an MVP in Axure using material design principles to be presented to upper management
Assisted the front-end development team build the application using Angular 6
Worked closely with developers to convert Adobe Illustrator layouts to a prototype using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular.js
Acted as a product manager for assessment of current infrastructure and created a three-year strategy and roadmap
Collaboratively worked with cross-functional team to manage the product lifecycle
